Key.Original: %3 to %2 : Requesting immediate air transport at grid %1
Key.English: %3 to %2 : Requesting immediate air transport at grid %1
Key.French: De %3 pour %2: Demandons évacuation aérienne aux coordonées %1

Key.Original: %2 to %3 : Roger, helicopter on the way to grid %1
Key.English: %2 to %3 : Roger, helicopter on the way to grid %1
Key.French: De %2 pour %3: Bien reçu, hélicoptère en route vers coordonées %1

Key.Original: %3 to %2 : Ok pilot, take us to grid %1
Key.English: %3 to %2 : Ok pilot, take us to grid %1
Key.French: De %3 pour %2: Ok pilote, destination coordonnées %1

Key.Original: %2 to %3 : Roger destination set to grid %1, let's go!
Key.English: %2 to %3 : Roger destination set to grid %1, let's go!
Key.French: De %2 pour %3: Bien reçu. Coordonnées %1, en route
De %1 pour %2: Nous sommes arrivés %2, Godspeed!

Key.Original: Someone else has already called the taxi, air transport unavailable
Key.English: Someone else has already called the taxi, air transport unavailable
Key.French: Quelqu'un d'autre a déjà appelé le Taxi, taxi indisponible

Key.Original: %2 to %3 : we are %1 km from target, E.T.A. one mike, get ready.
Key.English: %2 to %3 : we are %1 km from target, E.T.A. one mike, get ready.
Key.French: De %2 pour %3: Nous sommes à %1 km de l'objectif, E.T.A. une minute, tenez vous prêts.
De %2 pour %1: Demandons annulation du transport.

Key.Original: %1 to %2 : Roger, transport cancel we're RTB
Key.English: %1 to %2 : Roger, transport cancel we're RTB
Key.French: De %1 pour %2: Bien reçu, hélicoptère annulé

Key.Original: %1 we have a problem your transport was shot down at grid %2 !
Key.English: %1 we have a problem your transport was shot down at grid %2 !
Key.French: Nous avons un problème %1, votre transport a été abattu aux coordonnées %2!

Key.Original: The pilot has started the landing procedure, course cannot be changed at that point.
Key.English: The pilot has started the landing procedure, course cannot be changed at that point.
Key.French: Le pilote a commencé la procédure d'aterrissage, impossible de changer de destination.
En route vers la destination choisie

Key.Original: New course set, old course abandonned
Key.English: New course set, old course abandonned
Key.French: Nouveau plan de vol, abandon du plan de vol précédent

Key.Original: Someone in your group is already setting up a course.
Key.English: Someone in your group is already setting up a course.
Key.French: Quelqu'un dans votre groupe est déjà en train de définir un plan de vol.

Key.Original: Double click on map to set final destination, you can set intermediate waypoints by holding CTRL and double clicking on map
Key.English: Double click on map to set final destination, you can set intermediate waypoints by holding CTRL and double clicking on map
Key.French: Double cliquez sur la carte pour choisir la destination finale, vous pouvez définir des points de passage intermédiaire en maintenant CTRL enfoncé.

Key.Original: Makes a helicopter slaved to a group. One helicopter in a different group must be synced with one unit from a group. The group will then have control of that helicopter provided they fit the conditions to call it (see options)
Key.English: Makes a helicopter slaved to a group. One helicopter in a different group must be synced with one unit from a group. The group will then have control of that helicopter provided they fit the conditions to call it (see options)
Key.French: Asservit un hélicoptère à un groupe. Un hélicoptère dans groupe différent doit être synchronisé avec une unité du groupe. Le groupe aura le contrôle de cet hélicoptère s'il remplit les bonnes conditions pour l'appeler (voir options)
Erreur: les coordonnées ne sont pas valides

Key.Original: You have failed to reach and mark the LZ in time, MEDEVAC Cancelled
Key.English: You have failed to reach and mark the LZ in time, MEDEVAC Cancelled
Key.French: Vous n'avez pas atteint et marqué la Z.A. à temps, EvaSan annulée.

Key.Original: N- No enemy troops in area
Key.English: N- No enemy troops in area
Key.French: N- Pas de forces ennemies dans la zone

Key.Original: X- Enemy troops in area (Armed escort required)
Key.English: X- Enemy troops in area (Armed escort required)
Key.French: X- Présence ennemie sur zone (Escorte armée requise)

Key.Original: You don't have anything to mark the LZ!
Key.English: You don't have anything to mark the LZ!
Key.French: Vous n'avez rien pour marquer la Z.A.!
A- Personnel militaire de la coalition
B- Personnel civil de la coalition

Key.Original: This is %1 we're almost there %2 ETA One Mike
Key.English: This is %1 we're almost there %2 ETA One Mike
Key.French: Ici %1 nous sommes quasiment sur zone %2, ETA une minute.

Key.Original: %1 this is CROSSROADS. Our MEDEVAC has been shot down, last known position was %2
Key.English: %1 this is CROSSROADS. Our MEDEVAC has been shot down, last known position was %2
Key.French: %1 ici CROSSROADS. Notre EvaSan a été abattu, dernière position connue %2

Key.Original: This is %2 you can go %1, bring them back safe!
Key.English: This is %2 you can go %1, bring them back safe!
Key.French: De %2 vous pouvez décoller %1, ramenez-les sains et saufs!

Key.Original: This is %1.We're bringing your guys back %2. Rendez-vous at %3
Key.English: This is %1.We're bringing your guys back %2. Rendez-vous at %3
Key.French: Ici %1. On vous ramène vos gars %2. Rendez-vous aux coordonnées %3

Key.Original: This is %1.We're in position guys. %2 Get ready to fast rope!
Key.English: This is %1.We're in position guys. %2 Get ready to fast rope!
Key.French: De %1 nous sommes en position. %2 préparez-vous pour dépos corde lisse!

Key.Original: This is %1.We're at %3. I'll hover until you give me a new objective %2
Key.English: This is %1.We're at %3. I'll hover until you give me a new objective %2
Key.French: Ici %1. Nous sommes à %3. Vol stationnaire jusqu'à nouvel ordre de votre part %2

Key.Original: This is %1.We've reached %3 starting loiter pattern %2
Key.English: This is %1.We've reached %3 starting loiter pattern %2
Key.French: Ici %1. Nous sommes à %3 je commence le survol de la zone %2

Key.Original: The helicopter will land at LZ and all troups inside will disembark. The helicopter will then fly away and despawn or go to base
Key.English: The helicopter will land at LZ and all troups inside will disembark. The helicopter will then fly away and despawn or go to base
Key.French: L'hélicoptère atterira sur la LZ déposera les troupes puis quittera la zone pour retour base ou despawn.

Key.Original: The helicopter will fly in circles around the provided waypoint until it is given a new waypoint
Key.English: The helicopter will fly in circles around the provided waypoint until it is given a new waypoint
Key.French: L'hélicoptère survolera la zone en faisant des tours autour du point marqué jusqu'à ce qu'un nouvel objectif lui soit donné.

Key.Original: The helicopter will land and wait at LZ until it is cancelled or given a new waypoint. After a while it will shut its engine down
Key.English: The helicopter will land and wait at LZ until it is cancelled or given a new waypoint. After a while it will shut its engine down
Key.French: L'hélicoptère atterrira et attendra sur la Z.A. jusqu'à ce qu'il soit annulé où reçoive un nouvel ordre. Après un moment il coupera ses moteurs.

Key.Original: The helicopter will hover at a low altitude above provided waypoint giving time for units to fastrope.
Key.English: The helicopter will hover at a low altitude above provided waypoint giving time for units to fastrope.

Key.Original: The helicopter will hover at given position and stay there until it receives other orders
Key.English: The helicopter will hover at given position and stay there until it receives other orders
Key.French: L'hélicoptère entrera en vol stationnaire sur position jusqu'à ce qu'il reçoive de nouveaux ordres.
